    • translationEffect

      @NotNull public static @NotNull List<javafx.animation.Timeline> translationEffect(javafx.scene.Node node, double boundsXDiff, double boundsYDiff, double timeStamp, Runnable beforeFinishRunnable, double beforeFinishTimeStampPercent, int cycleCount, boolean autoReverse)
      Translates a node by X and Y values
      Parameters:
      node - Node to translate
      boundsXDiff - X translation amount
      boundsYDiff - Y translation amount
      timeStamp - Time of the translation
      beforeFinishRunnable - Runnable to run before the translation finishes
      beforeFinishTimeStampPercent - Runnable to run at a certain percent of the translation
      cycleCount - Number of times to repeat the translation
      autoReverse - If the translation should be reversed
      Returns:
      Timeline of the translation
